pkgmetadata.longdescription: Structural Equation Modeling for the Social Relations Model // Provides functionality for structural equation modeling for the social relations model (Kenny La Voie, 1984; doi:10.1016/S0065-2601(08)60144-6; Warner, Kenny, Soto, 1979, doi:10.1037/0022-3514.37.10.1742). Maximum likelihood estimation (Gill Swartz, 2001, doi:10.2307/3316080; Nestler, 2018, doi:10.3102/1076998617741106) and least squares estimation is supported (Bond Malloy, 2018, doi:10.1016/B978-0-12-811967-9.00014-X).
